Regular posts on machine learning research

Bringing back the website

After a long pause, I realized the importance of writing regularly to express my ideas. The objective is to support my research and personal studies through regular posts.

I also recovered old posts from the years 2013 to 2015 on entrepreneurship and on managing data science teams.

I hope these and future posts are valuable for anyone looking at strengthening their enterprise machine learning capabilities.

2019-10-02

About Rodrigo

International by design, speaking five languages, Rodrigo is a Mexican German machine-learning researcher. He has worked on leadership roles in machine learning research and data science in South East Asia, the Americas, and Europe with leading FMCG, Internet, and electronic companies over the last fourteen years.
